字幕内容: and you know Emperor Father feels about such things.
Worshipping is not allowed within the palace.
it is only right for me to give offerings to your parents with you.
It’d be unreasonable to let you go alone…
Nangong Jingnu: Are we going or not?
Qi Yan: This subject appreciates the thought
There is nowhere to provide those offerings.
Nangong Jingnu: You… are from the Jin province
so… We can head to somewhere secluded
and light incense for them there.
this son… has scored the title of Flower Seeker
and was appointed as the Fuma of the Zhenzhen Princess.
Her Highness treats this son extremely well
Such a self-address would not be appropriate…
Nangong Jingnu: Since we’re outside of the palace
we’re just a normal married couple.
There’s nothing wrong with calling myself that.
I will take good care of Qi Yan.
**this is a Princess of the Wei kingdom…**
**She is the only family I have left.**
It’s fine even if your parents are no longer here
as long as you still have me
